head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BARRY, MARIE GAFFNEY

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BARRY, MARIE GAFFNEY

block.p: BARRY-Marie Gaffney, 81. Of New Canaan, died Sepember 7, 2000. Born October 22, 1918 in Binghamton, NY. Daughter of the late Ray and Mary Gaffney. Aunt of David Gaffney, Hamilton, Mass., Phillip Gaffney Madison, NJ, James Gaffney, Pennington, NJ. Service will be held Thursday, September 14, 11AM in the First Presbyterian Church, New Canaan. Contributions to the charity of ones choice or the Jr. League of Stamford-Norwalk, 748 Post Road, Darien, CT. 06820.
